physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:153 x 207 mmFormat:Albumen print on paperCondition:The print is in good condition with staining in the sky and sea areas, particularly in the lower left and right corners, and minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘b’; ‘46’Process:Albumen print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View looking due east towards Fort Jellalee (Fort Al-Jalali) at the harbour mouth in Muscat, with the British Consulate to the right. A flag-staff on the roof indicates the British Consulate.Various dhows and small craft are anchored in the harbour in the middle-ground.Inscriptions:Lower right, in pencil alongside image: '46'Lower left, in pencil alongside image: 'a'Below image, in pen: 'Fort Jellalee, Muscat'
